Purpose: To measure the concentration of free thyroxine (T4) in serum for accurate clinical assessment of thyroid function.
Container: Red-top tube (no anticoagulant) or Serum Separator Tube (SST)
Equipment: Free T4 Dialysis Kit, centrifuge, incubator (37 Â°C), dialysis membrane units, immunoassay or LC-MS/MS analyzer
